title: BRIGHT 1-BR APT MAIN & CUSTER NEAR SHOPS, RAIL & BUS
posting_body: ['BRIGHT 1-BEDROOM APARTMENT at Main & Custer in vintage building with modern appliances and hardwood floors.', 'Rent includes heat and water.', 'Tenant pays for cooking gas, electricity, cable and internet.', 'AVAILABLE FOR SEPTEMBER, 2022 OCCUPANCY.', 'LIVE CAR-FREE >>>', 'PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION IS AT YOUR DOOR: CTA Buses and Purple Line train, METRA commuter rail, NORTHWESTERN U. shuttle at Chicago and Main', 'IF YOU DRIVE >>>', 'EASY PARKING:', 'Private lot behind the building or on neighborhood streets.', 'CONVENIENT LOCATION: restaurants, boutiques, laundromat/cleaners and food markets are down the block and around the corner.', 'Only a ten-minute walk to beach and parks, Lakefront Historic District , bike/jogging paths.', 'Convenient to Northwestern and Loyola Universities.', 'Only 20 minutes by METRA train to downtown Chicago or the north shore suburbs.', 'PERSONALIZED MANAGEMENT', 'For more information or to set appointment: phone or text Carla at 847/736-2824  Please leave name, contact info and desired date of occupancy.']
